arcade.patch.sim.output

Class PatchOutputSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.sim.output.PatchOutputSerializer

  • public final class PatchOutputSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for patch-specific object serializers.

    Generic serializers include:

    • PatchOutputSerializer.PatchSeriesSerializer for serializing PatchSeries
    • PatchOutputSerializer.PatchCellSerializer for serializing PatchCellContainer
    • PatchOutputSerializer.LocationListSerializer for serializing PatchLocationContainer lists
    • PatchOutputSerializer.CoordinateXYZSerializer for serializing (x, y, z) Coordinate
    • PatchOutputSerializer.CoordinateUVWZSerializer for serializing (u, v, w, z) Coordinate
